name: Insane Ambulance
description:
Insane Ambulance is a Game made for the Mega Health Jam 2022 where you play as an Ambulance in a City full of People with a variety of conditions and Ailments. And the goal of the game is to collect all of the Patients and get them to their Related Destination without any of them dying.

Healthcare Issue: Community & Social Responsibility  (Access To Care)

Controls:

WASD: Drive

Arrow Keys: Drive

Spacebar: Change Radio Stations

Credits:
